popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

popupAnnouncementTreatment.ctaText: Watch your crypto grow with Pooled Staking. Stake your crypto and earn rewards for securing the Ethereum network.

seo.pageTitle: You Can Buy Crypto Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet
seo.pageDescription: You Can Buy Crypto and Swap Tokens Effortlessly at Competitive Rates Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Buy crypto with MetaMask. Just click on the “Buy” button on the MetaMask browser extension or mobile app to get started. You can also connect your wallet to MetaMask Portfolio to get started.

MetaMask shows you a range of quotes based on your region, your preferred payment method, the token you want to buy, and the providers that are available to you.

With a funded MetaMask wallet, you’re ready to explore web3 on your own terms.

Onboard to crypto with MetaMask. Visit MetaMask Portfolio and click the “Buy” button to get started. You can buy crypto with PayPal, credit card, or with many other payment options.

MetaMask shows you a range of quotes based on your region, your preferred payment method, the token you want to buy, and the providers that are available to you.

With MetaMask Portfolio, you can unlock the full potential of DeFi and explore all that web3 has to offer.

node.headline: Buy cryptocurrency with your preferred payment option

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our providers generally support credit and debit cards such as Visa and Mastercard.
You can buy crypto with Apple Pay, Google Pay, and PayPal (where available).
You can use ACH transfer in the USA and SEPA in Europe.
Our providers also support a wide selection of alternative local payment methods.

modules.title: Transparent fiat to crypto exchange rate

image.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate

imageDarkMode.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate dark

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Each payment method has a different fee structure based on the region. Generally speaking, credit or debit transactions are more expensive with lower limits while bank transfers have fewer fees and higher purchase limits.

When using this method, you can expect to pay a provider’s fee*, a MetaMask fee (1%), and a market rate for gas.

*Providers’ fees vary. Please check the selected provider’s website for details on their specific fees.

Some users end up paying gas fees twice: once when they buy on a centralized exchange or elsewhere, and then again when depositing into MetaMask.

Buying cryptocurrency on MetaMask eliminates this double cost and has the added benefit of making your funds available immediately without a holding period.

backgroundImage.title: The best way to buy cryptocurrency bg

node.headline: Own your crypto in a private way

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask does not store—nor has access to—any personal information you provide when buying crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.

Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.
MetaMask vets all our providers for your peace of mind.

backgroundImage.title: Own your crypto in a private and safe way bg

childMarkdownRemark.html: You can buy stablecoins and native tokens directly within MetaMask globally across a wide variety of networks: Ethereum, Polygon, Linea, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Celo, Optimism, and Arbitrum among others.
Buy crypto how you want, when you want
Buy Ethereum or other cryptocurrencies through our vetted partners directly from your wallet.
Buy crypto with your preferred payment method through our partner integrations.
Compare quotes form multiple providers and choose the most competitive rate offered by our providers. Limited shifts in exchange rates, regardless of how much crypto you buy.
